input.sentences: we went to see where grandma grew up .
she nearly cried when she saw this sign . this house is where she grew up .
it was a beautiful grand house | grandma said .
this home is where her grandparents lived . she said she misses them so much .
she could n't believe that there was a sign on this house too . grandma said she wished she did come here . she liked the memories in here head better .
output.sentences: Grandma grew up in this small, pretty yellow house.
After she grew up she moved away from the house and a sign was posted there.
This grand old house is where my grandma lived for several years, after she married Grandpa.
Sometimes Grandma misses the home and the town where she grew up.
When she saw it vacant and with a sign posted she sighed and wished she had not, because it was so much nicer in her memories.
